"Legacy Chests":
"Legacy Chests are objects which can be unlocked to receive items, at the cost of some of the Exploration Points that you've earned during your current Quest.

Legacy Chests come in Blue, Green and Red varieties. The amount of Exploration Points it takes to unlock one depends on the color: Blue takes the least, then Green, then Red takes the most. However, the more expensive the chest, the more valuable the rewards."

"Legacy Chests' locations can be seen on your Radar Map.

However, their color is not shown on the Map, and will not be visible until you get close enough."
